sources.title: The Sky Spider
sources.description: Title: The Sky Spider Summary: The three Morgan brothers, Glenn, Jim and Buddy are all air mail pilots. The plane flown by Jim is shot down by Hugh Jeffries for the money it carries. Another flight is made by Buddy ... Directed by: Richard Thorpe Actors: Glenn Tryon, Beryl Mercer, Blanche Mehaffey Production Company: Action Pictures Release Date: 1 October 1931 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.20 : 1 The three Morgan brothers, Glenn, Jim and Buddy are all air mail pilots. The plane flown by Jim is shot down by Hugh Jeffries for the money it carries. Another flight is made by Buddy followed by Jeffries intending to shoot him down also...

metadata.Plot: The three Morgan brothers, Glenn, Jim and Buddy are all air mail pilots. The plane flown by Jim is shot down by Hugh Jeffries for the money it carries. Another flight is made by Buddy followed by Jeffries intending to shoot him down also...
metadata.Actors: Glenn Tryon, Beryl Mercer, Blanche Mehaffey
